head.title: Generate Stamps for {{FileFormatUp}} Using {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Leverage {{ProdShortName}} and {{ProgLang}} to create custom stamps and place them on any page within {{FileFormatUp}} documents.

header.title: Embed Custom Stamps in {{FileFormatUp}} with {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Design and apply stamps to any section of your documents using {{ProdFullName}}. Our solution offers extensive customization options to meet all your business needs.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a robust tool that allows you to add various stamp signatures to documents. It supports over 60 different file formats, including PDFs, Word, Excel, images, and ZIP files. You can apply text, image, barcode, metadata, digital certificate, and stamp signatures. In addition to adding signatures, you can search for, verify, modify, and remove them.

more_features.title: Protect Your Document Content with Signatures
more_features.description: The {{ProdFullName}} library is designed for signing and managing signatures across popular file formats. Effortlessly add, modify, verify, or remove stamps and other types of signatures.

feature_1.title: Sign Your Documents
feature_1.content: Apply customizable signatures to any part of your document. Choose from various signature types, including text, images, barcodes, QR codes, and stamps. Additionally, hidden metadata can be added or modified to enhance document security.

feature_2.title: Search and Validate Signatures
feature_2.content: Once a document is signed, use our verification tools to ensure that the signature content is valid. Search for and retrieve a list of all signatures for further processing.

feature_3.title: Update Signatures as Needed
feature_3.content: Easily modify a wide range of signatures applied to a document. Update properties such as size, color, position, content, and more.

feature_4.title: Remove Signatures
feature_4.content: Need to remove signatures from a document? Our API fully supports signature deletion, making it easy to manage your documents effectively.

formats.title: Apply Stamps Across Multiple File Formats
formats.description: The {{ProdShortName}} API supports stamping documents in over 60 formats. Place stamps on any page or area to improve document management and customization.

operations.title: Explore Our Core Features
operations.description: Utilize a wide range of options for adding, managing, and deleting signatures.

examples.comment_1: Use the document path with the {{TextSignature}} object
examples.comment_2: Instantiate {{StampSignOptions}} with the desired signature text
examples.comment_3: Add one or more stamp lines

steps.title: Steps for Adding Stamp Signatures to {{FileFormatUp}} Documents via {{ProgLang}}

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) provides a stamp constructor that can be highly beneficial for {{EnvName}} applications. Utilize it to create well-customized stamps for your document pages.
content.step_1: Provide the {{FileFormatUp}} document to be stamped.
content.step_2: Use {{StampSignOptions}} to configure all necessary parameters.
content.step_3: Add as many lines as needed.
content.step_4: Apply the stamp and save the document.

code_1.title: Add Custom Stamps to Documents using Special Signatures
code_1.content: Learn how to generate and add custom stamps with important textual information to your documents.
code_1.comment_1: Provide the document to be stamped
code_1.comment_3: Set the size and position on the page
code_1.comment_4: Add one or more outer round lines with text
code_1.comment_5: Add one or more inner square lines
